articles.title: I got plastic surgery so my kids would inherit my new nose
articles.description: A TikTok user from Argentina has gone viral for joking that the results of her "nose job" would be passed down to future offspring – prompting backlash from viewers who couldn't sniff out the satire.
articles.content:
She sure has a nosey audience.
A woman from Argentina has gone viral for joking that the results of her “nose job” would be passed down to future offspring — prompting backlash from viewers who couldn’t sniff out the satire.
“Yo haciéndome la rino pa... [2979 chars]

articles.title: Canada's Andreescu, Shapovalov advance to 3rd round of Miami Open
articles.description: Canada's Denis Shapovalov has advanced to the third round of the Miami Open tennis tournament with a 6-3, 3-6, 6-3 win over Argentina's Guido Pella.
articles.content:
Canadians Bianca Andreescu and Denis Shapovalov have advanced to the third round of the Miami Open tennis tournament.
Andreescu, from Mississauga, Ont., moved on in the women's draw with a 5-7, 6-3, 6-4 win over seventh seed Maria Sakkari of Greece i... [2686 chars]

articles.title: A Locals’ Guide to Buenos Aires: The Buzzy Bars, Grills and Chic Shops That Insiders Love
articles.description: After Argentina’s World Cup win, the city is in a state of prolonged elation and we’ve found four notable residents, including soccer star Nicolás Tagliafico, to recommend their favorite spots
articles.content: FOUNDED IN 1536 by Spanish explorers, Buenos Aires has been called the “Paris of South America.” Sprawling and sophisticated, it has cobbled streets, chic cafes, abundant plazas and colonial architecture (Spanish, French and Italian) that lend it a E... [587 chars]
